title: Subject Matter Apprenticeship
description: Structured application of a specific content area in schools and informal educational settings. Topics include: Arts, English, Science, Mathematics, Social Studies, and Physical Education and Health. The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected. Participation in public schools requires mandated fingerprint clearance. Credit/No Credit grading only. 1 lecture, 1 activity. Formerly LS 280.
prerequisites: Junior standing and consent of instructor
